Entries.companionRejected: I've already got enough on my plate today.$2
Entries.companionRejectedNight: If I go who will make sure Claire doesn't nod off during the night shift?$3

Entries.companion_Town: I'll never understand why some townsfolk are so against Joja Corp.$2#$b#Our presence has done nothing but help Stardew Valley!$3
